```{r}
# rolling dice
# using chi square test to test if they are fair dices
p1 <- 1/6
p0 <- 5/6
chisq.test(x = c(48,35,15,3),
           p = c(
                p0 ^ 3, 
                choose(3,1) * p1 * p0 ^ 2,
                choose(3,2) * p1 ^ 2 * p0,
                p1 ^ 3
                )
           )
```
